actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Military Personnel and Civilian Employees' Claims Act of 1964 to permit officers and employees of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands to receive compensation for damage to, or loss of, certain personal property.
short_title: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands Employees Claim Act
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands Employee Claims Act - Permits officers and employees of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands to receive compensation for damage to, or loss of, personal property incident to the service of such officer or employee in the Government of such Trust Territory.

titles.title: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands Employees Claim Act

A bill to amend the Military Personnel and Civilian Employees' Claims Act of 1964 to permit officers and employees of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands to receive compensation for damage to, or loss of, certain personal property.
